title: 5 Reasons to Install Kodi on your iPhone or iPad Right Now
text:
5 Reasons to Install Kodi on your iPhone or iPad Right Now Posted by Ali Hassan Mahdi on Mar 17, 2017 | No Comments Pin 1 Shares 32 
Kodi is a popular media player app that allows users to watch, listen and access any type of content ranging from movies and TV shows to songs, pictures and podcasts. 
Kodi supports a number of operating systems including iOS, Android, macOS, Windows, and Linux. We previously showed you how to install Kodi on your iOS 10 iPhone or iPad with or without a jailbreak, and in today’s post, we will outline the 5 best reasons to install Kodi right now. 5 Reasons to Install Kodi on your iPhone or iPad 
1. Live TV Channels 
Why pay for cable or satellite TV networks when you can watch live channels right from your iPhone. With Kodi, you can watch you favorite channels at any time and from anywhere. All you need is a working internet connection and the right addon. 
You can watch channels from major networks including Comedy Central, BBC, The History Channel, and much more. 
2. Stream Movies and TV shows 
Watching your favorite movies and TV shows right from the palm of your hands has never been easier. With Kodi, you can install any of the available third-party addons for streaming your favorite content. The best part is that these addons fetch streams from various different sources, thereby providing you the flexibility to choose the stream with the highest quality. 
3. Listen to Podcasts 
Whether you want to listen to your favorite podcast or find a new one, Kodi has got you covered. By default, Kodi allows you to add podcast feeds to the app so that you can view the recently released podcasts, but you can also install third-party addons to discover new ones. 
4. Live News 
Most cable TV networks require a premium subscription to view news channel, but with Kodi, you can watch any live news channel for free at any time from any part of the world. All you need is the appropriate Kodi addon such as NewsLook. 
5. Play Retro Games 
Kodi is not just for watching movies, shows or TV channels. If you miss playing the old console games from your childhood, then Kodi has got you covered. Free ROMS Downloader is an addon for Kodi that allows you to browse and play a huge collection of retro games and the best part is that you can install them directly from your device without the need for a computer. 
These are some of the best reasons to give Kodi a try. If you’re already using it, then do let us know why you like it and what addons you have installed. Like this post? Share it!
